tier_label: Professional Job Level and Leadership Hierarchy

Level_1.label: Entry / Analyst / Junior
Level_1.notes: Early-career professionals or fresh graduates. Learning-focused roles.

Level_2.label: Mid / Associate / IC
Level_2.notes: Hands-on individual contributors. Start of independent work and responsibility.

Level_3.label: Senior Mid / Manager
Level_3.notes: Manages small teams or projects. Transitioning to leadership.

Level_4.label: Senior / Director
Level_4.notes: Strategic leaders managing large departments or regional operations.

Level_5.label: Executive / CXO / Founder
Level_5.notes: Top-level executives or founders. High leadership and business ownership signal.

notes: Defines cross-functional job hierarchy and leadership progression levels. Fully aligned with academics, company tiers, and region weights schema to ensure consistency during resume scoring and model fine-tuning.
